info.title: API Forge
info.description: All-in-one developer toolkit API. 193+ endpoints across 30 categories: text processing, markdown (HTML-to-MD, TOC, stats), YAML (parse, serialize, validate), ID generation (NanoID, ULID, CUID, Snowflake, ObjectID), emoji utilities, country/currency data, string case conversion, JSON utilities, color manipulation, number formatting, unit conversion, data transformation, validation, encoding/decoding, fake test data, security utilities, QR code generation, barcode generation, language detection, readability scoring, math/statistics, MIME type detection, URL parsing, cron expression parsing, date/time, regex, IP/network. Zero dependencies. Deployed on Cloudflare Workers.
